sentences.sContent: He had doctored his passport to pass her off as his daughter.
sentences.sCn: 他窜改了护照，谎称她是他的女儿。

sentences.sContent: There are concerns that some players have been doctoring the ball.
sentences.sCn: 有人担心说一些选手在球上做手脚。

synos.tran: 修理；窜改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

words.tran: 博士的；博士学位的；有博士学位的

trans.tranCn: 修理；篡改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位
trans.tranOther: to dishonestly change something in order to gain an advantage
someone who is trained to treat people who are ill
